CustomField.description: Used in SREC contracts. This is based off of the NMC value on the Opportunity. It shows how many dollars are included in the Current Customer Subscription kW DC.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used in SREC contracts. This is based off of the NMC value on the Opportunity. It shows how many dollars are included in the Current Customer Subscription kW DC.
CustomField.label: Annual Cost of Electricity (Current)
